hero.title: Hello
hero.subtitle: My name is Brandon
hero.description: I'm a Solutions Consultant and Full-Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience supporting SaaS platforms in the US and Japan. I specialize in bridging business needs and technical solutions through strong communication, project management, and hands-on development using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Python/Django. This site was built by me, and reflects my passion for building scalable, user-friendly web applications that combine client support experience with modern full-stack engineering.

intro.shortDescription: I design and build API-driven web applications with a focus on clean architecture, authentication workflows, and scalable data models. My primary stack includes TypeScript, React (Next.js), Node.js, and PostgreSQL. With experience supporting SaaS platforms in both the US and Japan, I bring structured delivery, clear communication, and strong ownership to remote engineering teams.
intro.longDescriptionOne: I began my career in SaaS consulting within the energy industry, working at the intersection of business requirements and technical implementation. I supported client onboarding, validated data pipelines, worked with APIs, and collaborated closely with engineering teams to ensure systems aligned with real-world market constraints.
intro.longDescriptionTwo: Over time, I became increasingly interested in the technical architecture behind those systems ‚Äî how APIs were structured, how authentication was handled, how data models were designed, and how small engineering decisions impacted long-term maintainability. That curiosity led me to transition fully into hands-on full-stack development.
intro.longDescriptionThree: Today, I build API-driven web applications using TypeScript, React (Next.js), Node.js, Express, Prisma, and PostgreSQL. I focus on backend architecture, relational data modeling, authentication flows, and building maintainable frontend systems that scale cleanly.
intro.longDescriptionFour: My consulting background continues to shape how I approach engineering. I prioritize clarity, system coherence, and thoughtful implementation over quick patches. I build software with long-term support and extensibility in mind.

projects.title: VitaeAggregate
projects.desc: A community app designed around building ATS friendly resumes

Version control with Git and containerization with Docker
Managed project schedule, project backlog, and led daily standups in an agile development environment.
